name: Duck Goose
description:
- Duck Goose is a mini adventure game where you, duck, are on a quest to find your missing friend, goose. 

- search for clues to goose's whereabouts, collect good-noodle stars, and meet a diverse cast of animal friends. 

- use arrow keys to control the game (while you can play on mobile, it's much easier on a computer)

- music was made using Beepbox!

i hope you enjoy Duck Goose!
